body:
## What happened

(When i want to close the android studio i get this error and android studio does not close)

## Version information

Android Studio `4.1.2` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 54.0.1` • Dart plugin `201.9335`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

## Exception

null
